note: Basle, 1506), that of Erasmus (Basle, 1528–9), and that of the theologians of Louvain (Antwerp, 1576–7). In the following century an even greater edition of Augustine’s collected works was produced by the French Benedictines of St Maur (Paris, 1679–1700).
